00023 void DistributionGenerator::init_uniform(int min, int max) {
00024     boost::uniform_int<> range(min,max);
00025     gen_uniform_int_ = boost::shared_ptr < boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937&, boost::uniform_int<> > >
00026         (new boost::variate_generator <boost::mt19937&, boost::uniform_int<> > (png_mersenne_, range));
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 int DistributionGenerator::get_value_uniform() {
00031     return (*gen_uniform_int_)() ;
00032 }
00033 
00034 void DistributionGenerator::init_normal(double mean, double sigma) {
00035     /* p(x) = 1/sqrt(2*pi*sigma) * exp(- (x-mean)^2 / (2*sigma^2) ) */
00036     boost::normal_distribution<> params(mean,sigma);    // parameter for normal distribution
00037     gen_normal_ = boost::shared_ptr < boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937&, boost::normal_distribution<> > >
00038         (new boost::variate_generator <boost::mt19937&, boost::normal_distribution<> > (png_mersenne_, params));
00039 }
00040 
00041 double DistributionGenerator::get_value_normal() {
00042     return (*gen_normal_)();
00043 }
00044 
00045 void DistributionGenerator::init_bernoulli(double p) {
00046     boost::bernoulli_distribution<> probability(p);
00047     gen_bernoulli_ = boost::shared_ptr < boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937&, boost::bernoulli_distribution<> > >
00048         (new boost::variate_generator <boost::mt19937&, boost::bernoulli_distribution<> > (png_mersenne_, probability));
00049 }
00050 
00051 bool DistributionGenerator::get_value_bernoulli() {
00052     return (*gen_bernoulli_)();
00053 }
00054 
00055 void DistributionGenerator::init_exponential(double lambda) {
00056     boost::exponential_distribution<> params(lambda);
00057     gen_exponential_ = boost::shared_ptr < boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937&, boost::exponential_distribution<> > >
00058         (new boost::variate_generator <boost::mt19937&, boost::exponential_distribution<> > (png_mersenne_, params));
00059 }
00060 
00061 double DistributionGenerator::get_value_exponential() {
00062     return (*gen_exponential_)() ;
00063 }

00065 void DistributionGenerator::init_uniform_real(double min, double max) {
00066     boost::uniform_real<> range(min,max);
00067     gen_uniform_real_ = boost::shared_ptr < boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937&, boost::uniform_real<> > >
00068         (new boost::variate_generator <boost::mt19937&, boost::uniform_real<> > (png_mersenne_, range));
00069 }
00070 
00071 double DistributionGenerator::get_value_uniform_real() {
00072     return (*gen_uniform_real_)();
00073 }

00075 void DistributionGenerator::init_uniform_on_sphere(int dim) {
00076     boost::uniform_on_sphere<> params(dim);
00077     gen_uniform_on_sphere_ = boost::shared_ptr < boost::variate_generator<boost::mt19937&, boost::uniform_on_sphere<> > >
00078         (new boost::variate_generator <boost::mt19937&, boost::uniform_on_sphere<> > (png_mersenne_, params));
00079 }
00080 
00081 std::vector<double> DistributionGenerator::get_value_uniform_on_sphere() {
00082     return (*gen_uniform_on_sphere_)();
00083 }
00084 
00085 Vector3d DistributionGenerator::get_value_uniform_on_sphere_3d() {
00086     Vector3d randomVector3d;
00087     randomVector3d.insert_element(kXCoord,0.0);
00088     randomVector3d.insert_element(kYCoord,0.0);
00089     randomVector3d.insert_element(kZCoord,0.0);
00090 
00091     std::vector<double> randomVector = (*gen_uniform_on_sphere_)();
00092     std::vector<double>::iterator iter;
00093 
00094     int currentDimension = 0;
00095     for(iter=randomVector.begin(); iter != randomVector.end(); iter++ ) {
00096         randomVector3d.insert_element(currentDimension, *iter);
00097     }
00098     return randomVector3d;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void DistributionGenerator::set_seed(unsigned int seed) {
00102     png_mersenne_.seed(seed); // int is not possible
00103 }
00104 
00105 DistributionGenerator::DistributionGenerator(unsigned int seed) {
00106     set_seed(seed);
00107 }
